text: Kare-ra (fushin-sha) wa, tenshi-tachi ga yattekite (kare-ra no tamashī o hikinuki),-nushi no (shobatsu no) meirei ga kudaru made matsu soto wa nai node wanai ka. Kare-ra izen ni moso no yōna mono mo ita. Shikashi arrā wa kare-ra o futō ni atsukatta wakede wanai. Daga kare-ra wa jibun jishin o (fushinjin ni yotte) gai shita dakedearu
